resources.string: Choose a category to discover wallpapers
Storage permission is required to save wallpapers
Backdrop Wallpaper App lets you discover and set stunning wallpapers on your device. Browse through a wide variety of categories or search for exactly what you are looking for.
This app uses the Pixabay API. All images are provided by Pixabay contributors under the Pixabay License.
Images are free to use for commercial and non-commercial purposes. No attribution is required but always appreciated. For more details, visit the Pixabay License page.
This Privacy Policy describes how Backdrop Wallpaper App ("we", "our", or "the app") handles your information when you use our application.
We do not collect, store, or share any personal information. The app does not require you to create an account or provide any personal data.

This app uses the Pixabay API to fetch wallpaper images. All images are provided by Pixabay contributors under the Pixabay License. When you use the app, image requests are sent to Pixabay\'s servers. Please refer to Pixabay\'s privacy policy for details on how they handle data: https://pixabay.com/service/privacy/

The app requires the following permissions:

• Internet Access: To fetch wallpaper images from the Pixabay API.
• Storage Access: To save wallpapers to your device.
• Set Wallpaper: To apply wallpapers to your home screen and lock screen.
All wallpaper data is cached locally on your device for performance. No data is transmitted to external servers other than the Pixabay API for fetching images.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the app with an updated effective date.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the app store listing.
